definition: president (of a country)/same as 總統|总统

sentences.english: A plot was uncovered against the President.
sentences.chinese: 謀害總統的陰謀敗露了。

sentences.english: She tries to back track, but the President simply walks away.
sentences.chinese: 她試圖重新回到話題，但總統一言不發地走開了。

sentences.english: Afghanistan's Second Vice President Abdul Karim Khalili was present at the meeting as guest of the host country.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗第二副總統哈利利作爲東道國客人出席會議。

sentences.english: That apparently made quite an impression on the president's young daughter.
sentences.chinese: 着很顯然給總統的小女兒留下了很深的印象。

sentences.english: The president's attempt to correct governmental abuses is successful.
sentences.chinese: 總統爲匡正政府弊端而做的努力頗有成效。

sentences.english: He is due to be formally inaugurated in front of parliament on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 艾哈邁迪內賈德星期三將在伊朗議會上正式就任總統。

sentences.english: The Vice President orders them to find the leak.
sentences.chinese: 副總統命令他們找出這個泄密的人。

sentences.english: The president's left-of-centre programme threatens to polarise Congress.
sentences.chinese: 總統的激進計劃使國會發生了兩極分化。

sentences.english: The President refused to either confirm or deny this rumor.
sentences.chinese: 總統拒絕證實或否認這種傳聞。

sentences.english: The president dispatched a messenger to tell the premier what happened.
sentences.chinese: 總統派出一名信使向首相稟報所發生的事。

sentences.english: Mr. President, Condoleeza Rice is here to see you.
sentences.chinese: 總統先生，賴斯女士想和你通話。

sentences.english: At the very least, that will make it hard for a future President to keep tax-cut promises.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，下一任總統將很難兌現他們減稅的承諾。

sentences.english: The president is telling all of these people that he is very angry with Nordstrom.
sentences.chinese: 總統是在告訴所有這些人，他對諾德斯特龍很生氣。

sentences.english: A man ran up to President Garfield, pulled out a gun, and fired twice.
sentences.chinese: 一名男子奔向加菲爾德總統，拿出一支槍射擊了兩次。

sentences.english: Statue of the Turkmenbashi, President Niyazov.
sentences.chinese: 尊稱爲“土庫曼巴什”的尼亞佐夫總統的雕像。

sentences.english: During Bush's tenure, the US economy experienced only 2% job growth.
sentences.chinese: 布什總統在任期間，美國經濟經歷了只有2%的增長。

definition: to take part in an election/to run for office
Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
to be a candidate in an election or other selection process/to run for office/to turn out to vote
